name: Horror Game (Francesco Fusco)
description:
This is a demo version of a zombie post-apocalyptic survival horror I'm planning to develop. 

You will play as Ethan Walker, an ordinary guy who will have to make it through a very unpleasant situation.

According to the last radio warning, Ethan is heading to the only safe-area left in the nearby, the police station.

This chapter is set in a subway, where Ethan must find the key and start the train to reach the next station.

------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

    

WASD - Walk

SHIFT + WASD - Run

Mouse - Look

RMB + LMB - Fire

RMB- Aiming

F - Interaction

RMB + R - Reload Weapon

TAB/I - Open Inventory

ESC - Pausa Game
